1: <mistake>@@//gnas//de</mistake> dag <mistake>dbus</mistake> su rdzogs pa <mistake>gang//de</mistake> ni rdzogs <mistake>par</mistake> mi gnas <mistake>so//skad</mistake> cig gcig mngon <mistake>rdjzogs</mistake> sangs <mistake>rgyas//rdzogs</mistake> pa <mistake>lani</mistake> g.yo mi <mistake>'gyur /gang</mistake> <mistake>che</mistake> <mistake>dog</mistake>
2: nor bur <mistake>sems //de</mistake> ni skad cig <mistake>thams</mistake> cad <mistake>rdzogs//dkar</mistake> <mistake>po'i</mistake> phyogs la 'di mi <mistake>gnas//res</mistake> 'ga' dkar min la mi <mistake>'gro //phyogs</mistake> gnyis po yi dbus gnas <mistake>pa //rdzogs</mistake> pa la
3: gnas gnyis su <mistake>med//gtsug</mistake> tor las ni shar ba <mistake>de'i //rdo</mistake> rje nor bur rdzogs par <mistake>'gyur//de</mistake> chags bral las cha nyams <mistake>pa//rdo</mistake> rje nas nyams la <mistake>rab</mistake> <mistake>rdzogs//slar</mistake> yang <mistake>gtug</mistake>
4: tor du shar <mistake>ba//slar</mistake> yang rdo <mistake>rjenor</mistake> bur <mistake>rdzogs//de</mistake> chags bral <mistake>as</mistake> <mistake>cha</mistake> nyams <mistake>pa//lus</mistake> can ye shes nyams pa <mistake>min //'di</mistake> yi bde ba che rang <mistake>bzhin //rdzogs</mistake> pa'i sgra yis <mistake>brdzod</mistake>
5: <mistake>scae par</mistake> <mistake>bya//dngos</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>bar ma</mistake> gzhan thams <mistake>cad// 'byung</mistake> dang bsdud pa'i rgyu <mistake>yinno//srid</mistake> las mya <mistake>dgan</mistake> 'das par <mistake>'gro /de</mistake> las slar yang <mistake>sridg</mistake> par <mistake>'ong// rang</mistake> phyogs dag las zla bzhin <mistake>dang</mistake>
6: <mistake>grod</mistake> pa dag las snang byed <mistake>bzhin//rdzogs</mistake> par mi g.yo ba <mistake>'dini//s</mistake> rnams kyis ni yongs <mistake>rdjzogs</mistake> <mistake>nyid //nyi</mistake> khri brgyad gnyis <mistake>brga</mistake> yi <mistake>dbugs//'gyur</mistake> med skad cig zos rnams
7: <mistake>kyis//phyogs</mistake> gnyis yang dag gnon pa <mistake>ni//sa</mistake> rnams kyis ni yongs su <mistake>rdzogs//bden</mistake> don rnam pa bcu gnyis <mistake>pa//rnam</mistake> pa bcu drug 'gyur ba <mistake>med //rnam</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> bcu <mistake>gnyimi</mistake> <mistake>sontu</mistake>
8: rnams <mistake>kyis//rdzogs</mistake> pa gnyis su med pa <mistake>mchog/cha</mistake> shes rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i <mistake>sems//rnam</mistake> pa bcu <mistake>drug</mistake> <mistake>ma</mistake> 'gyur <mistake>ba//don</mistake> gcig gnyis su med pa <mistake>chos//dam</mistake> pa'i don te
